nad gso shi bas slong byed na// de gnyis mthu dang yang mi ldan// de smras lan du 'di skad du// ka la nag pos de blan pa// sngon gyi rgyal ba grangs med kyis// brtul zhugs 'di lnga gtsor spyad na// dam tshig

dam par bzung ba na// sngon gyi dam tshig yin par grags// de la dam pas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas dam tshig yin nges na// dang po nas bzung rdzogs par du// de dang mi 'brel ldan dgos na// zag rgyun chad
na 'bral 'gyur 'gal// de la ka las 'di skad du// bdag de ltar par 'gyur ba yis// zag pa de yang rtag pa ste// kun las kun du mi 'bral zhing// zad nas bral ba la ga yod// de la dam pas 'di skad
du//phyi dang nang gi zag pa rnams// thams cad thams cad kun zad pas// sa dang rnam thar las rnams ltar// ci smos kun snang zag lam zad// de la ka las 'di skad du// ji ltar gal te de ltar na// 'gal
ba nyid du yin zin na// thams cad mnyam par 'ches pa rnams// mnyam pa nyid du mi 'gal lam// de la dam pas 'di skad du// kun du ma 'dres mi shes par// bzang po'i tshig la blo gtod cing// kun tu
bzang por khas 'ches pa// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// yongs su rdzogs par kun mnyam yang/ ma 'dres par yang kun tu snang// yongs rdzaugs don du ma mthong bar// rdzogs spyod log pa'i lam pa

yin// gsang chen theg pa'i tshig dang sgra// gcig la mi gcig so sor snang// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par phye// gang nyid nges par grol bar snang// nges pa zag 'byung rtsar 'dod na// de dag de bzhin ma bcos

par// ye nas stong nyid rtogs rtog med pa// yin par nges pa de kho na'o// de dag ci phyir rtsi zhe na// rnal 'byor nang ni rnam rtog ste// rtag par 'khor ba'i gting mthar 'chi// rtog pa'i rtsa ba phyi

nang gi/ kun nas zag pa rnam lnga yin// de kun de bzhin nyid stong du// rtog bral mu mtha' med 'byung bas// nad gso shi ba slong ba'o// dam pa mchog nges de blan pas// mtshan mar zhes las de 'grol te// de

nyid der nges rnyed gzhan min// de nyid che mchog sman par 'gyur// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni nad gso bar bya'o zhes nges par thos pa rnam par bgros pa ste 'di ltar nges par shes par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i
bdag pos de skad ces smras pas// lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa dam pa rnams mtshan ma'i rtog pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rang
'byung bdud rtsi'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o//// bam po bcu pa ste tha mar zug pa/ de na yang lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsol pa/
kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyid kyi rgya cher bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ji skad du brjod par bgyi// mdo ni gang du 'dus pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa las/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smas pa// kye lang

ka'i bdag po kho bos ji lta ba bzhin bgros pa'i gsang ba dam pa 'di ni brjod pa'i rnam grangs brgyad du brjod par bya'o// mdo ni bcur 'dus par shes par bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la rnam grangs brgyad

gang zhe na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po zhes kyang bya'o// snying po zhes kyang bya'o// rdo rje dgod pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya'o// rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i lung zhes kyang bya'o// kun 'dus rig

pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes kyang bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs rnam par bkopad pa zhes kyang bya'o// theg pa chen po byung tshul bstan pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe

na/lang ka'i bdag po gang la dgong pa de nyid las mi 'da' ba dang/ gang gi spyod yul ma yin zhing/ med pa las thams cad 'byung ba dang/ gang gi ye shes yongs su bkod pa dang/ 'di ltar gang nges pa rnal
'byor du lung ston pa dang/ 'dir kun nas rngub pa dang/ dam pa rnams kyis mngon par chud pa dang/ gang la ma 'dres par bkod pa dang/ gnas skabs bcu gnyis su nges par byung zhing 'byung ba'i phyir ro/

lang ka'i bdag po mdo bcur 'dus pa gang zhe na/ gang mtha' bcu kho nar 'dus pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar gzhi gzung bar bya'o// rgyud dgrol bar bya'o// sgo dbye bar bya'o// mthar phyin par bya'o// thams cad
'du bar bya'o// la dor bar bya'o// sa gcad par bya'o// nyams rnyed par bya'o// tshegs chung bar bya'o// mdo gcig tu bya'o// lang ka'i bdag po de la chos thams cad kyi gzhi ni dam tshig yin
par shes par bya'o// dam tshig gnas ni 'di lta ste// bsrung bya bsrung du med pa ni// chos nyid dam tshig dam pa yin// kun kyang dam pa nyid yin pas// gang la'ang 'gal bar mi bya'o// su la dam pa 'di

gnas pa// rig 'dzin dam pa'i sa pa yin// bsrung bar bya ba'i yul rnams la// sgyur gsog g.yo med dam pa nyid// zab sangs rgya che dam pa 'dir// 'di skad 'grugs pa'i tshul khrims dang// rtog pa'i bya ba

ji snyed par// kun 'dir dam bsrungs rnam par dag/ dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// kun gyi thun mong ma yin phyir// mos pa chung ngu thams cad la// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag gzung bar bya'o/ theg chen yongs su

gsang ba dag/ snod ma yin par gyur pa la// phyi dang nang dang gsang bayi// sba ba'i thabs su bsrung bar bya// bstan pa'i gnas min snod gang dag/ rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams// ma 'ongs rab 'byor
dam pa yis// brtags nas gsang ba bya phyir bshad// gsang chen yid bzhin nor bu 'di// skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te// blo chung rnams la phan don du// thugs rje thabs kyis shin tu gsang// 'jig rten pa
dang theg dman dang// log sreg lo la phyogs la zhen// dad med blo zhan g.yeng rmugs shing// gang la mi brtson mun par mtshungs// 'di log dam nyams 'di las log/ byang chub thag pa gting nas chad//

sems kyi myu gu rtsa tshig pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha sbub yin// gsang ba'i don rnams sgrar smra yang// gab pa'i gsang ba 'di mi shes// g.yon can shes rlom grogs rnams la// gsang bar 'os pa lhag par smra/

yan lag rnam bzhi de nyid la/ sgra thos don med nyams mi len// gang gis gang gtad mi thub pa// bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin// lta dang dam tshig spyod pa yi// dam pa'i mdzod gsum sgrar smra yang// zhen
pa'i mtha' med gnas ma gyur// g.yo sgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs// bya med chos la nges 'dzin cing// de la de nyid de med par// rnal 'byor can la dman zer ba// dam pa pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'bo//

tshul rtogs tshod len khyad tshig 'dren/ kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing// gang la dmod rmongs dam can te// tshe gcig dregs pa'i ched phyir rung// rku g.yo sgyu ldan slu 'drid pa// zang zing phyir 'bring tshig la
dga'// rlom sems brjod 'dod tshul 'chos pa// log smra dug can tha mar ltung// 'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la// gsang chen gsang ba de kho na// zab cing gting dpag dka' bas na// bstan kyang
pham ltung gnas su 'gyur// de bas bstan par bya ba min// gal te bstan par gyur na ni// ston smra nyan byed de dag gang// mthong yun phung byed gnyis sreg 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkhas gsal
don ldan la// rnal 'byor mi shes gang dag gis// dregs pa'i dbang gis phrag dog gis// bsam pa'i rnam grangs ci bskyed pa// de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par// 'bras bu mi bzad myong bar 'gyur//
gal te bde bar rjes len pa// de snyed bskal pa gzod 'jug dgos/ mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni// gong ma bzhin du nges bsam na// de yang gnas ngan len pa ste// mkhas pas de la skyod mi nus//

rnal 'byor tshul byung dam pa la// mtshon cha'i tshig gis de dkrugs shing// sgro skur glu gleng ngan brjod na// dmyal ba'i rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// zhal las byung ba'i rnam smin yang// ji ltar ba nyid de ltar 'gyur//

skal pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ rtsa nyams skyon can rang bzhin ni// ngan rgyu khro gtum ldan pa dang// mi bzad phra men las spyod byed// gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can// byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas//
shin tu dman pa'i lta ba yis// tshul 'chos pa la ltos par byed// gang dag dam pa'i dam par ldan// byams tshul rtags tu bzod nas pa// tshul shis don rnams de bzhin slong// de la gang dag 'dun pa med//

dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du// byang chub snying po thob pa yi// sangs rgyas nam yang mi 'byung ngo// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong// rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor pa// lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la/

gang dag kha cig dregs dbang gis// de spong thabs kyis de dmar byed// de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste// nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung// mi shes rmongs pa'i rnal 'byor ba// yang dag dam par nges 'gro

ba'i// rjes su 'gro bar mi byed cing// zang zing 'dod par gang lta ba'i// rjes su 'gro zhing der 'dun byed// de ni log pa'i lam pa yin// rnal 'byor lta dang byang chub khe// 'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung//

zang zing 'dod dang g.yo sprul khe// chung ngu'ang ci sgrub srog dang sdo// rnal 'byor dam pa'i rang bzhin can// bum snod nang gi sgron ma ltar// rig pa mdzod kyi don ldan yang// srog chags rkun po'i sder mo ltar/
khong nas gang sbas don ston la// gang 'dir blul pos cir mi mthong// dper na 'di 'dra tshul gcig ste// gang gi yul la gter 'chang mi// blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnyis// gnas gcig gnyis mtshungs

khyad med 'dra/ gsang 'di sngags pa rjod byed cing// gsang ba don du gnyer ba med// ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing// ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med// yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing// yang dag
don du gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing// dam tshig don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag/ nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste/ 'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes//
de yi yon tan rgya cher brjod// de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis// de ltar 'dod pa 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag cung zad yod dam zhes// dris kyang med pas slar smras pa// gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi// yon
tan cung zas smos par zad// de nyid bdag la med ces smra// de bzhin rnal 'byor mi brtson pas// bslab par bya ba'i chos bral bas// dam pa'i bsngags pa rjod byed kyang/ de dag la ni dam pa med// de la
sogs pa'i longs spyod rnams// dam pa nyid dang phrad par dka'// rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can// gsang ba 'jigs pa'i sgrar bltas nas// de dag sdig pa
mthong ba ltar// 'chad cing sa bcing gang byed pa// skyes bu de ni dam pa'i sras// dper na gang de gang dag gis// gang gi rgyal khrims 'das 'gyur na// rang dga' mi gtong lugs dang sbyor// bka' yi yo

srongs dka' ba de// rgyal po'i thugs mnyes dam pa zhes// kun la snang ba grags par 'gyur// ldum ral dug gi sdong skyes na// ldum pas dug de shes ma thag/ rtsa nas phyug ste med par byed// ci phyir ldum zas
de dag la// dug 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir ro// gang dag nyams 'gyur dug can de// brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor pas// gnas sam lo yis zhugs te spangs// gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa// de dag
gsang ba'i dam sri yin// don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// tha tshig zab mor bcas rnams la// bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin// rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams la// gal te ma tshor zhig 'gyur yang//

rnam smin yod kyang rtsa mi nyams// ji ltar glang po e na ya// shi nas ror ni gyur mod kyang// gi wang rtsis ni don byed ltar// rnal 'byor nyams te ror gyur kyang// gzhan gyi dam par de 'gyur zhing// de yi don

byed nus pa yin// de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams// rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig/ rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun
ma rungs 'gyur// 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi// log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun// don dam nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya// gal te ma spangs log spyod na//

'khor ba'i g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te// bden pa'i byin brlabs mthu chung 'gyur// kun kyang dge spyad don chung zhes// yang dag don la yid 'byung zhing// log pa'i chos la gzhol bar 'gyur// kun gyi log pa'i
las spyad pas// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung// des na sgro skur gnyis byas pas/ bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa// ye shes can ltar rang bzhin gyis// nam yang gnod pa yang mi mdzad// de yi
'khor na gnas pa yi// de dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams// rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi// skyon mthong tsam na cad pas gcod// thams cad ngan 'gror spyi'u tshugs lhung// sgrub pa'i gnod mchog gcig

yod de// 'di dang mi mthun kun rdzogs pa'i// rgyun ldan don ldan dang tshul bzang// ci la'ang chags med stong ldan sems// shes rab rnam grol lde mig gis// gti mug tha ram blo phye nas// chos kyi rgyal po'i
mig ldan pas// mtha' dag dbung bral dam pa'i yul// ma nor lam du 'jug shes pas// sdong chen sdong por rab tu dul// tha tshig lung las 'byung ba bzhin// drang srong dka' thub dam pa de// dam pa'i dam

pa nyid yin pas// de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// ji ltar dka' thub thub pa ltar// de ltar yid bzhin no bu ste// yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung// rig 'dzin rgyal ba kun yum mo// de bzhin dka' thub dam
pa 'di// gnas pas rten pa'i bzhi yin te// dka' thub kun gyi srog kyang yin// dam pa kun gyi nor mchog go/ dam pa'i 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam pa'i bgrod pa'i lam mi mchog/ dam pa chu bo sgrol
ba'i gru// de bzhin dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te// dam tshig long ba'i dmigs bu yin// gzhan sde 'joms pa'i dmag dpung yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed//
des na dam pa'i gtan tshigs yin// ci nas gang gi sgo gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' bzung nas// gang 'dir dbang bzhi sun mi 'byung// sgo gsum mi gnod dang bcas gzung// yongs su ma nyams mdo

bzhi'o// mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhi bcas// mdo dran pa la bgrang zhing bsngo// 'dul ba'i rgyun ldan tha tshig can// mos pa chung ba'i bu rnams kyis// phra mo'i phra mo phra yan chad// nan tan gyis ni bsrung bar bya/

sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// gsung dang spyod dang yid 'ong dang// mi 'dor shes bya grub pa dang// med dang phyal ba gcig po dang// lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa bcu// lta ba 'di las 'bum phrag 'byung// rnal
'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// spyad par bya yi nor mchog yin// rnal 'byor dam pa'i rigs rgyud las// nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu// zam mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di

bstan// 'di yi sngon 'gro dam tshig ste// zab mo la sogs kun sngon du// rdo rje tha tshig drag po yi// gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams// nges pa'i don gyis btsan red
na//de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin// de ltar dam pa'i sdom pa la// gnas nas dus kyi skabs dag tu// bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig dag/ dam tshig kun gyi thog

mar 'gro// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs nas// kun dang mthun phyir de ltar spyad// mi shig pa ni seng ge ste// gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so// za ma tog ni rgyal po'i mdzod// dug sbyor ba ni der mi rigs//

rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/ bregs te byung rgyun gcad ma yin// gangs kyi zhun chu phan pa yang// mkhas pas btung bar mi bya'o// pad+ma'i ze 'bru kha mi dbye// zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya// ma brtags bug rdol

can snod du// bdud rtsi sman blugs zag par 'gyur// don med bcos ma'i tshul rtags can// bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel dkar rin chen sgo nga dag/ 'dam khung rdzab tu bsnub mi bya// seng ge dkar
mo'i 'o ma dag/ gser snod ma yin blugs mi bya// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yang ma yin/ khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba// de dag gcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi dur

mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yin no// stag seng rol pa las byas pa'i// las kyi rjes la bzlas mi bya// rdo rje bral chen gtams pa'i gzhi// gzhig par bya ba ga la yin// rdo rje ra ba'i re ga de// bsdam bya dral

bar bya ba min// bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma de// 'thor rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya// rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol dkar gcad par bya ba min// rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dganam zhar dbye bar mi bya'o/

rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar// rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o// gtsug gi yid bzhin nor bu de// rgyal mtshan rtsa las dbon mi bya// rnal 'byor thabs kyi khyad par can// rtsal can rnams kyi dam tshig ste//

skal ldan dag gi nor mchog yin// rgyun du sbyang ba'i nor mchog ni// rdo rje las kyi bsam gtan dag/ rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis// srog la bar chad byed pa'i dgra/ nyon mongs thibs po de gzhom bya// snyom

las le lo'i gzhir gyur pa// thugs thub ra cod nga rgyal ri// dregs byed dang po nyams pa'i bcud// dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya// theg chen gsang sngags ma gtogs pa// mtshan ma gang dag byis pa'i

tshig/ zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing// thams cad de nyi kho nar bya// ji ltar gsad pa'i mi gang dag/ gshed ma mis ni gsod pa'i tshe// thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa ltar// le lo dgra bcom brtson par 'bad/
rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gags bsal ba// dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can// 'dod spyod zhen dang mi mthun dang// gcig la gang 'dir mi gcig pa// phyi nang can dang gnod sbyor can// 'dod myos bying rmugs
brkam pa dag/ dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can// mkhas pa yongs kyis spang bar bya// de ni rnal 'byor bgegs yin te// rnal 'byor bar du gcod par byed// rnal 'byor nges par zhugs

pa la// rgyun gyi bar du gcod pa'i bdud// rnam rtog 'phrig pa chen po dang// gang la btang snyoms le lo dang// longs spyod 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba dang// tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po dang/ khro gtum ngang thung shin tu

'khrug/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bdud lnga yin// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen po byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog/ rnal 'byor nor la 'phrog pa'i dgra/ thabs la mkhas pas
dul bar bya// gang gi rnal 'byor rar bzhin bcos// drang srong nyid las nyams 'gyur te/ kha na ma tho grags pa yis// de dag bcas dgar 'gyur ba'i dgra/ lta dman spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis// lugs por

'di las log par spyod// bka' log phra men las spyod pas// don du mi 'gyur 'chal ba'i dgra// 'da' ka rdo rje dka' thub dam// klong du ma gyur phyal bas 'chal// rtsa bar rul pa'i ljon shing bzhin// 'chad

pas drig por 'byung ba'i dgra// rnal ma nyid la sbyor ba de// gang la nges pa'i tshig med na// don rnams grub pa ma yin te// 'bras bur mi 'gyur gol ba'i dgra// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor spyod pa la// dam pa'i

nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra// thabs la mkhas pa'i blo gros kyi// skyon gyi dgra bzhi bzlog par bya// srid gsum snang ba'i zhing 'di dag/ rnam dag zhing du nges pa ste// sa rnams cig car nges pa ste// zhing rnams
dam pa'i mchog yin no// 'dod spyod mchod pa'i tshogs 'di dag/ yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te// dgongs pa dam pa kun mnyes pa'i// rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// 'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag/

bde ba chen po gnas yin te// ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// rtsol med lhun gyis grub pa'i sa'o// kun gyi rtsa ba dug chen lnga// ye shes chen po lnga nyid de// kun shes rang rig rang byung bas// rnal 'byor
rang rig mig ldan pa'o// lang ka'i bdag po 'di dag ni// dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog yin te// dam pas gdams pa'i tshig 'di la// gang dag nges pa'i rnal 'byor yin// ji ltar sa gzhi gshin pa la//

brten nas sa bon btab pa las// dam pa kho na 'jug par 'os// 'un pas gang gi de nyid kyang// 'un cing dam pa'i yul la 'jug/ lang ka'i bdag po ji ltar na// de yang ji ltar bu zhe na// kho bo mthong thos
skabs gcig na// bdag gi bshes gnyen dam pa des// 'dus pa phal po che dag la// lam 'di rgya cher bstan pa'i tshe// 'khor 'dir 'dus par gyur pa yi// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// bu mo drug gi 'khor
'dus pas// 'bras drug smin par gyur pa yis// gang dag 'tsho ba'i srog 'dzin ltar// chos rnams kun gyi gzhir gyur pas// dam tshig 'di la gnas pa ni// bla med byang chub rnam smin pas//
dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o// gal te nyams par gyur pa na// chad pa'i skye gnas dmyal chen brgyad// mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po yis// 'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du 'khor// lang ka'i bdag po gang 'di

las// nyams par gyur pa gang zhe na// kun tu nyams pa chen po dang// rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin bzlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// rtag par rgyun gyi khor mor 'byung// gang de bkang bar bya

ba'i thabs// rnam par lnga ni bshad par bya// las dang rdzas dang 'dud pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang de nyid do// las ni rnam lngas skong 'gyur te// dang po 'bum khri gsum pa ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsum mo//

yan lag nyams par gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// bzla nyams brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la// bco lnga gcig gsam dag gis skongs// rdzas ni rin chen sna lnga yis/

rigs kyi dam tshig gang nyams las// bla ma rigs lnga gang dag la// tha tshig gang rlom nor des bslu// 'dun pa dad pa dang ba yis// gdung ba'i shugs kyi nga ro yis// rtag par rma ga chad pa ni// dmyal chen

gnas na spyod bzhin du// gnyen po mchog tu de 'gyur te// de ni skong ba dam pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs chen yang// 'jig rten sreg la me dgos kyang// bag chags sreg la me mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes
me byung bas// sgrib pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang// mtshan ma 'bud la rlung mi dgos/ rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul kun rnams par 'phyag/

lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang// sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes chu byung bas// bag chags ljan ljin thams cad dag/ stong nyid chu bo khrus kyi rdzing// de bzhin nyid kyi nam mkha' nas//
'phar 'phro me yi bskal par tshig/ de ni skams pa dam pa'i mchog/ de nyid de yi thabs mchog kyang// rnal 'byor dam pa gang zhig dag/ nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba la// de bzhin de nyid ma g.yos kyang//
mgon skyabs de las gzhan med de/ nyams dang ma nyams tha snyad med// bkang ngam mi bkang tshig lam bral/ lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni gzhi yongs su gzung ba rnam par bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad
ces smras pas lang ka'i bdag po la sogs dman pa rnams dam pa rnams kyi nor la yongs su spyod par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las dam tshig gsang ba'i mchog gi
le'u zhes bya ste drug cu drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ kye grogs po dam pa dag rgyud yongs su grol ba ni dam pa la rag las pa ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta

ste/bla med snying po smin pa'i rkyen// blo gros chen po dri ba'i yul// lam stor sa mkhan bshes gnyen mgon// mun sel sgron ma'i rin po che// mthong mig dbang po yid rnam shes// chu bo rab med sgrol ba'i gru/

'jigs pa'i rdzong chen rten pa'i mkhar// 'khor ba'i gcong 'byin sman pa'i mchog/ mtsho gling rin chen len byed pa'i// ded dpon dam pa'i bla ma de// sngon du nges par shes par bya// sde mdzod gter khyim khang
chen dang// rnam 'grel lde mig bcu gnyis dang/ nges mdo dam pa de nyid bcu// mtha' bcu yan lag mdo rtsa ba// gang 'dir skabs bcu rdzogs ldan nam// skyon gyi mtha' rnams zad 'gyur zhing// yon tan rgya
mtsho'i pha rol phyin// dam pa'i tshad la bab ma bab// de la bshes gnyen mgon bltas na// mthar chub yongs su rdzogs zhe 'am// gang rig de yul ma yin par// thabs dang yan lag bcas pa yis// gzhan

gyi yul nas brtag par bya// brtags pas bsngo ba kun ldan na// gzhan gyi yul la 'gro mi bya// dam pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs na// dman pa'i yo byad med la min// nges par kun tu bzang nyid na// gang gi blta
yul ngan la min// sgron me 'tshub rlung spyod la min// 'dod 'chal tshig 'chal dman la min// blun rmugs rmongs la ga la srid// 'jig rten pa'i skyon de bzhin du// dam pa de dag ji ltar yang// sa mkhan
lam la mkhas nges na// ji ltar bzod par bya dka' yang// thams cad thams cad bzod par bya// dam pa 'di ni sa mkhan te// 'di ni bdag gi mgon yin pas// 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad kun// nges par
thas cad sgyu ma yin// gang 'dir gyi na tsam 'di dag/ dam par gang la 'gog ma yin// skad cig tsam gyis mthong 'di la// de lta zhig na 'di lta la// de srid tsam du bzod par zad// ci gar gar cig 'byung
'joms sgrubs// log pas gyin da gyin da 'di// dam pa'i don du mi sbyor ram/ snyam du brtags te dam par bya/ yun gyi don srid chen po la// dmigs nas blo gros phyir bskyed de// bde mchog bde ba'i dam
pa dang/ skad cig tsam gyi tha snyad 'dis// btang snyoms bya ba ga la srid// gang 'dir mgon med bdag 'khyams na// gang gis phyogs 'di dag la ni/ phan 'byung rigs can su ga na// dam pa ma gtogs
gcig 'ga' med// 'di na phan dang mgon mang zhing// dman par 'brel ba gang yod kyang// log par bsgrub pa'i blo gros mkhan// g.yang sar mchongs pa'i snga bgros mkhan// don la 'gog snyam yod min
te//bshes gnyes skyabs med ci slad du// kun kyang dmangs rigs grong khyer 'gro// byams blo'i yul du ga la rung// gang 'dir mun par 'khyams pa la// bde mchog snang ba'i lam ston pa//
skyabs chen dam pa gang de lags// gzhan gyis bskyab par nus ma yin// des na dam pa gang dag la// bsnyen pas shin tu bsten par bya// gang 'dir snang ba'i tshul 'byung na// dam pa nyid du 'dun par
gsol// dam par snang ba thob phan chad// dam pa de las 'ga' 'gyur las// rdul gyi cha yang mi bya'o// rgya mi bcag cing lung mi bor// 'dun pa nas bzung las rung ba'i// bar du de la ltos dgos so// gang

'dir ngo gang ma zin pas// btang snyoms tsam du tshul bsad na// de la dam pa'i don med de// de rkyen de dag mi ldan pas// bslab pa'i yul bzlas the tshom zos// le los yul la mi brtson zhing// phyal bas
de la ma gus pas// shes bya mun pa'i tshogs kyis bsgribs// gang gis nam mthong thibs kyis 'gags// gang la byis pa shed mi 'bye// mdud pa'i bcing ba de las byung// shes rgyud gol bar ga la srid//

dam pa'i yo byad lnga dbul ba'o// phongs pa de yis gzhan bsgral na// de yang dbul po nyid du 'gyur// 'tsho ba dam pa dang bral bas// longs spyod chen pos phongs pa yi// mu ge'i dgon pa nyid du ltung// de
lta'i gang zag dman pa de// dam par gzug bar gyur phan chad// dam par nges dang ma nges kyang// bka' bcas lugs por ga la srid// gal te de yi rgya nyams na// dmyal ba rdo rjer de 'gro ste// mi bzad

sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// dmyal bsrung khyi ni lu de zhes// grags pa seng ge gzugs 'dra ba// mche ba gzangs rings dbal rno bas// rbad cing mtshon cha'i lam bu bdas/ spu gri rno dpal ral gri nags//

nang du ga chad rgyugs skyabs med/ khro chu khol ma thal skyo yi// chu bor rab med nang du 'bying// rtse gsum mdung dang mda' bo che/ khab 'dra dbal rno gzangs rings dang// chu gri ral gri rnos gang pa'i// mun
dong me 'bar nang du ltung// sdug bsngal rgyud pa de dag las// thar pa'i skabs ni mi srid do// slob mar gyur na sems ldan pas// dam pa de la nyes byed gang// sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas// de dag

rtag tu spyi'u tshugs 'gro// dam pa kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// dam pa nyid las gang 'das pa// rnal 'byor dam pa dbang gyur pa// thams cad 'khrugs nas khrag chen 'thung// dam pa'i yi ge 'bru bkod pa//
dbugs chen nang du shar nas kyang// lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa// rag sha yag shar gyur pa des// bsad nas dmyal ba chen por brgyud/ rnam par 'tshe dang nor 'phrog dang// bgegs dang dug pa'i dug
dbal gyis// nyams pa de la 'tshe bar byed// sdig can yin te 'chi bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i chad pa la sogs pa// 'jigs pa brgyad rnams de la 'byung// sho gam gcan chen la sogs pa//
gnod sbyin gyis bsad mi bder 'gro// ci phyir lha srin sde brgyad las// gtum mo gtum mo dam can kun// chos srung bka' yi las mkhan yin// bka' yi las la dus mi 'dor// des na chos la spyod pa yi//
dam par 'jug pa'i bu rnams kyis// nam yang zhabs la mi smod cing// bka' zur gcag par mi bya'o// gang gis rtse gcig chos bsrungs na// chos la bsrung ba'i srung ma rnams// gtum po mthu chen rnams

kyis kyang// bu bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed// chos srung ba yang gang zhe na// chos rnams kun la ma rmongs shing// nges par shes pa gang yin pa// chos srung ba la mkhas par 'gyur// gang zhig kun la mi mkhas

shing// rmongs pa'i lta ba brtan pa can// bsgyur bas cis kyang mi 'gyur te// nams kyang chos ni srung mi 'gyur// gal te dus ni thams cad du// dam pa de dag de gcig na// rgyud zhan skyo ngan snyoms las kyis/

de dag 'gal na ltung grib rgyu// nges na dam pa'i lung mi gcag/ tshad mar nges pa dam pa'i lung// thams cad ldem dgongs can yin te// yul dang 'tshams par sbyor ba yin// de yang ji lta bu zhes na// ji ltar
log sred can dag gis// su dag 'jig rten 'dren gang lags// kye ma 'jig ten dga' byed khyod// thams cad dga' bar ston shes na// bdag ltar dga' ba'i don bstan nas// 'bras bu gdon mi za

shes na// thams cad mkhyed ces de la bya// de ltar mos pa gang bstan pa// pha ma bram ze rgyal po rnams// bsad brlag yongs su bcom byas na// de dag rtag tu bde ba'i mchog/ de bstan de yis de spyad nas/
bde mchog bde dang ldan pa yin// de bzhin bka' yi ldem dgongs la// mdo dang don gal che yod pas// skyabs chen dam pa bzung ba de// tshad ma dam par yid ches na// de yi lugs kyang dam par bya// lang
ka'i bdag po gang gi tshe// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des// khor bo la ni 'di skad bsgo// sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// bskal pa 'bum gyi sangs rgyas pas// slob dpon gnyan par shes par bya//

ci'i phyir bskal ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// slob dpon dag la brten nas byung// slob dpon dag la ma brten par// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung ste// 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong// byung na dam pa'i
lugs dang 'gal// don dang ldan pa'i dam pa la/ dus gsum dus ni thams cad du// phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs rgyal ba kun byon na// sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do// sems
dpa' lha dang mi dag dang// de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang// srin po log lta can dag gis// rig pa 'dzin pa kun 'dus nas// sprul pa'i me tog kun 'thor zhing// bla ma bshes gnyen dam
pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi pha lags so// bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so// bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyod// bdag cag rnams kyi mgon lags so// mi shes rmongs
pa'i blo gros mkhan// lam stor rnams kyi sa mkhan lags// mun khung 'khyams pa'i sgron ma lags// gdung ba sel ba'i rin po che// nyi ma'i zhal la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i thugs la phyag 'tshal
'dud// zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'dir ltar dga' dang gus pa yis// sngags dang 'dun pas phyag mdzad do// de'i phyir rgyal ba thams cad dang/ sems dpa'
rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// dam pa'i dam pa las byung bas// dper na ma yis bu bskyed ltar// de bzhin dam pa shes par gyis// dam pa de yi rang bzhin yang// yid brten sems dang dul ba dang// tshad
med yangs pa'i blo gros dang// rkyen thub bzod ldan kun tu drang// gsong por spyod la gya gyu med// sems can nyen can thams cad la// thabs kyis mi 'jigs sna tshogs sbyin// dpa' bo mthur ldan brtson

'grus che// shes bya'i yul ni thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung// srid pa zhus kyang zad mi shes// brtags shing yon tan phyi phyir 'byung// bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de
bzhin byed// legs dang nyes pa'i las rnams la// dga' dang mi dga' rtog 'dzin med// ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ltar// gzi ldan brjid che yul mi 'jug/ 'di 'dzi dman pa'i las rnams spangs// 'phyo
dag g.yeng bral gang na rtag/ seng ge lta bur gcig pur gnas// dgon pa'i rgyu dang dben lam bsten// 'di dang gang ldan dam pa'i 'os// dam pa thams cad bkus gnas so// rang bzhin de dang mi ldan
yang// dam pa'i mdzod dang gnyer ldan na// dam pa gzung zhing dam par bya// chos kun mi shes ma rtogs kyang// dam par gyur pa'i bla ma la// bkur gnas rim gro cher byas pas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
rgal 'gyur// ci phyir zhing rab gshin pa la// sa bon btab na rgyas 'phel bzhin// bsod nams dam pa'i zhing rab la// til 'bru mi stor 'phel mi 'gyur// 'khor ba'i mtha' las skyob pa yi// bshes gnyen
dam pa bzhi yod de// khungs dang lung dang dbang 'gyur dang// blo gros nges pa'i tshad ldan bzhi// de las gnyen po bzhi 'gyur ste// sems bskyed stobs dang 'gyod stobs dang// las kyi stobs dang dmigs
pa'i stobs// log pa'i stobs rnams 'joms par byed/ chu bo bzhi las rgal bar 'gyur// rgyud kun yongs su grol 'gyur te// dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas cang mi
gsung// de na lang ka'i bdag po 'dir// blo ldan dga' dang gus pa yis// dam par gyur to 'tshar rnams la// 'dun sar lan gsum gus byas te// zhabs la spyi bos gtug par bya// dam pa'am yang na ma

nges rnams// dam pa'i chos sogs 'dus byas te// kha na ma tho gzhom bya'i phyir// 'jig rten srid zhu'i 'dun pa bya// lung 'byung gang smod 'phel gtam la// yang du 'dun pas 'dun thabs sbyar// sri zhu sgra yis

mtshams bzung ste// gang de rnams ni ci bder dran// bde dang blang ba langs pa dang// don byed zhu sogs skabs rnams su/ rgyud gnyen sri zhu gus ldan pas// gyong sems med sngo nan tan bya// kun nas gzem

mdog bag la gnas// gsong por smra zhing gya gyu med// ci phyir dam par gyur pa la// ma nges gya gyu'i las byas pas// dam par gyur pa kun bslus te// dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// brtson dang 'grus ldan
ngang tshul bzang// brdeg cing gsang thub spyod pa dag/ ya bag bzhin bzangs mdzes thabs ldan// sbo gsum bzang spyod mtha' gsum bsdam// dam pa nyid dang mthun bzhin spyod// gsal la dag pas

go rnams dbye// dam pa'i nang na bder 'dug tshe// kun gyi tshig lam la mi 'byung// gang dag bzang dang ngan spyod la// 'thing slad smod pa yang mi bya// bdag la bzang dang ngan brjod cing// kun mthong kun

brjod sgro skur dang// gang dag tshig lam 'dren 'dod ma// tshig lam bcad na bde ba thob// dam pa'i yul na gnas rnams su// khong khro tshig rtsub khyal mi smra// bag yangs tshul gyis bya ba min// tshul med tshul

dang mi ldan pa'// nyam nga med par smra mi bya// phod dang lcags dang gang mthong dang// stong 'phyor rngom la sogs mi bya// gzhan la khyad gyis gsad pa'i tshig/ gang ris gcad par mi bya'o// dam pa'i gnas su
gyur pa la// rjes su rigs dang 'char pa'i yon// nor gyi dbyig dang na bza'i mchog/ rtsi mchog zas la sogs pa rnams// dbul dang gsol bas mnyes par bya// des ni nad dang dbul la sogs// bkres
dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis// nams kyang 'debs par mi 'gyur ro// zhu ba dbul ba nad pa dang// lung byang 'dun par 'dug pa dang// dam pa'i spyod pa ma rtogs pa/ dam pa dag dang gnas gcig tu//
zhabs 'bring ma rtogs nams kyang min// 'di ltar ma byas nyes byas so// sku yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing// zhabs rjes brlam par mi bya'o// na bza' chags gdan rten la sogs// nams kyang 'goms par bya
ba min// dam pa'i lung byung ming gis bsgrub// ming lcogs ma yin ma lcogs nam// sgyu sogs med pa gnas dor ro// dam pa'i dkor rnams srog bzhin bsrung// de yi nye gnas dam pa bzhin//

de yi 'khor g.yog nye du bzhin// rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems kyis blta/ khri mal stan bde bla ma'i thabs// mi gus la sogs mi tshul rnams// dam pa'i thad du yong mi mdzes// byas na sri zhu dam tshigs nyams/
mgo la zer ldir gdugs thogs dang/ lag rten lus brten de bzhin stong// gang 'dir ma rab thor bu'i thabs// snang ba'i yul nas bya ma yin// dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung mo'i tshul// dam pa'i

gzigs yul nams kyang min// khu ljo smyon pa kun tu rgyu'i/ spyod pa dam pa'i yul du min// snang ba'i lung la gang 'byung spyod// ji ltar spyod byung spyod pa byung// 'jal dal thos 'phrigs dogs bzhin spyad//

dam pa'i spyod pa'i snang yul nas// bag med che ba'i thabs mi bya// bsgrubs nas mdzes pa'i tshul bzung ste// bag dang ldan pas gnas par bya// lus kyi dor ba gang dag kun// mthong tshor yul nas yong mi

bya//snang ba lus kyi bya byed rnams// blo gros ldan pas bya ba min// 'dus nas 'du gang byed spyod rnams// dam pa'i 'dun sar rigs ma yin// 'phyo g.yeng brkam dang ma zhi ba'i// spyod tshul yul nas mi bya'o/
khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams// bsgribs sam phang gam bskyor bkab nas// thams cad bde bskyung 'jam byas te// dam pa de la ci mdzes bya// dam pa gdan bskyod gang phyogs nas// bdag nas

bsgrims te sri zhu bya// bskyod bcag brdzi sad gdan thabs sbyar// ma ldan nyid las ci bder sbyar// sngon rtsol lung 'byung sri zhu bsdu// de rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin no// blo ldan spyod lam bzhi spyod na// sri zhu
gus pas de bzhin sbyar// gang ma gus dang btang snyoms dag/ nam yang bya ba yong ma yin// sri zhi bsti gnas rim gro rnams// bya ba'i mdun dang de zan du// sri zhu bcug ste ci bder 'gro// bde shes la

sogs sri zhus zhus// yang dag dka' thub mdun nyid du// gar spyod gar skabs sri zhu dbul// mtshan nas nam yang mi brjod cing// dam pa bla ma bshes gnyen zhes// brjod pa'i tha mar zhus sgra gzhug/ khyad

par cir yang dbye bar bya// lung byung bka' bzhin zhus zhes brjod// thal sbyar gsung pa gzung bar bya// dam pa'i lung yul byung rjes 'brang// de kun sri zhus mtshon pa yin// mdzes pa'i tshul bzung gus
'dun nas// spobs pa nod pa gsum du zhu// gyong khengs med pa'i gnyen lcug gis// zhabs 'bring dgongs pa thams cad bya// dge slong sar pa'i spyod pa yis// bsgegs pa la sogs bya byed 'brang// rgyan
dang mtshon thogs spang par bya// blo gros gus pa de nyid kyang// nyid kyis nyid la dpyas bcug ste// gzhan gyi dpya ba'i gzhi rnams spangs// kun du mthun par bzang brjod pa'i// skyes bu gang

yin de ltar bya// kun gyis mthun par ma bsngags pa'i// tha shel gang yin de spyod spang// dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang// slob ma gzung dang chos smra ba// lung ma byung bar mi brtsam ste/ dam pa'i yul
nas de mi rigs// gal te gzhan gyi don byas na// de yi yo byad mi spyad te// de kun dam pa de la dbul// dam pas ci blangs lhag ma blang// dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang// dam pa'i mdun du mi rigs so/
bkuri bsti sri zhu la sogs min// gang yin dam pa de nyid mnga'// snying rjes dam pas ci gnang ba// sri zhu mdun bsu lam gnyis kyis// blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya// rmugs med dran gsal rab bsgribs

nas// rang gi spyod lam 'da' mi bya// blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma des// dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir// mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad brgyad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul// skyo dub med pa'i dad pa dang// gyong

khengs med pa'i mnyen lcug dang// ser sna med pa'i zang zing dang// som nyi med pa'i sri zhu dang// g.yo sgyu med pa'i drang dkan dang/ kha gsag med pa'i rang rgyud dang// rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang// dri
ma med pa'i lhag sems brgyad// dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul// dam pas bsgo ba bslab pa'i mtha'// chub par rdzogs pas rgyud dgrol te// shes bya kun la thogs med 'gro// rang rgyud mdud pa bgrol ba
yi//shes rab mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu// mthar chib rgyud dgrol yul spangs te// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad pa'i// nor mchog dam pa de la
dbul// rang gi lus kyang ci rigs par// rin thang gang yin nor gyis bslu// de nas ji bzhin gar bde bar// rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs// sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams// bde bar gshegs pa'i
rjes su 'gro// sngon gyi dam pa bder gshegs rnams// ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas// kun spangs dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas// nyid las dam pa mnyes par 'gyur// des na ded dpon dam pa dang/

nam du'ang 'bral ba ma yin te// ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin// blo gros dris na dam par 'gyur// ji ltar cang shes gyi ling dag/ sdom byed sgrog gis bcings 'gyur ba// bkrol byas bde blag byung 'gyur na/
ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar// sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di// mi shes bcing bas bcings 'gyur ba// dam pas rnam grol sgo phye bas// shes rgyud kun 'grol thogs med 'gro// 'di ni mi shes rgyud
'gro ba'i// mdud pa'i bcings ba 'grol ba ste// rgyud rnams grol ba'i bslab pa ru// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rgyud yongs su dgrol ba'i bslab pa'i mtha'
yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams slob dpon dam pa bsgrun par shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gi
dgongs pa 'gus pa'i mdo chen po las bsnyen bkur dam pa mchog gi le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po dam pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye

grogs po dag sgo dbye bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la// rig dang ma rig rnam pa yis// kun shes spyod dang kun du rmongs// rnam pa gnyis su snang ba la// tha dad du ma
mang por 'gyur// rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis snang ba// mi shes pa dang log par shes// mi shes rgyal ba rgyang phan gnyis// log rtog mur thugs mu stegs pa// de yang zhen chags log sred can// 'jig rten
'jig rten pa zhes bya// mu stegs log dang gzhan rkyen log/ zhar las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad// mi shes 'di gnyis gzhir snang ba// dman rigs dang ni rigs ma nges// rigs chad 'du shes can 'du dga
kun nas bkris pa'i mun pa yin// 'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang// gang la g.yeng dang ya nga can// mos pa can zhes grags pa rnams// sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang// log par rtog 'di ya mtshan can//

brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu gnyis// nyir shu'am bcu ste lnga gnyis dang// tha dad rnam pa du mar snang// yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las// 'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang// log par 'dzin dang

lta khyad dang// rang gi brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin te// rigs mi mthun pa sde lngar grags// rang bzhin log pas log pa nyid// gzhan rkyen log pa phra med spyod// lung la brten dang rtags tsam 'dzin// bcos
mar spyod dang mu cor smra// lung gi phyogs tsam brten pa dang// phyogs log gol dang bslang bas 'tshal// phyogs ltos gcos pa rnam bzhir grags// bcos ma gzhan las gyur pa dang/ 'di las gyur pa gnyis

kho na// gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad nor// longs spyod lnga ldan gzhan las gyur// dran pa rtag lta ltos 'dzin rgyu// med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes// kun nas rnam par mi g.yeng lta// gong du shes pa yod

smra lta// de bzhin med par lta ba dang// 'di gang 'di las gyur lta ba// gang du yod min med min lta// bdag shi 'di tshe mya ngan 'das// gang 'dir phyogs tsam brten pa ni// gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid//
phyogs log gol bar gang gyur pa// drug ste so so tha dad dang/ spyir lta gang rig skyon med pa'o// rgyur lta byams pas dag par lta// 'tsho ba bcos pas dag lta dang// rgyan la lham dang gos bcos
pa//skra spungs bcas dang rgyan can dang// dka' thub sten pa drug pa'o// bslad pas 'chal pa gang 'di la// brten pas bdag lta rten rtog dang// rten chags byin chags bkra shis mtshan// skyabs log

yongs su 'chal ba'o// phyogs ltos gcod pa gang zhe na// phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa// gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa'o// gang 'dir phyi rol rnam pa gsum// bye brag pa dang tha snyad pa// rang sang gcig

phyogs gcod pa'o// yang dag phra dang zab pa dang// rgya cher yangs pa de kho na// gsang sngags rig byed rig spyod pa// rigs sbyor dam par phyogs ltos gcod// gsang chen brtul zhugs cher spyod dang// rgyal

dbog pa dang rgyal thabs pa'o// zhar las byung ba gang 'di dag/ mtha' yas sde bcur rdzogs pa ste// gang mu zin pa de rtags 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye gnas so// lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang//

zhal nas byung ba ji lta ba// 'jig rten sgron ma nub rjes na// gang dag mos pa tha dad pas// zhar las byung ba'ang de bzhin no// kun shes spyod pa'ang rnam pa gnyis// rim gyis pa dang gcig pa'o// rim gyis
'jug pa rnam gsum du// phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang/ bsgrub spyod mngon rtogs gsum nyid do// 'di yang khyad par rnam gnyis kyis// gsum gsum gnyis su dam pa yis// gsung ba khyod ci mi shes sam//

des na che chung gnyis gsum drug/ sgrub pa zab pa phra ba gnyis// bloche zab pa dman pa nyid// spyod pa rlabs chen cha shas can/ rgya che ba dang mtshan mar spyod// de ni gsang chen gsang bar bshad// mngon rtogs

rnam gnyis phyi nang 'jug/ mi mthun phyogs kyi gal bzung nas// cha gnyis so sor 'dod pa 'byung// phyi rol bye brag tha snyad gnyis// cha gnyis gcig las rtsod pa 'byung// nad 'jug sems snang dbus mtha'
med// phyi nang snrel zhing phyogs 'dzin cing// gang 'dir nges par gcod pa 'byung// mtha' dbus 'byed dang nges par 'jug/ gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung// rang dang lta ba'i phyogs 'dzin cing//
brtsod pas the tshom 'byung ba dang// dbus mtha' 'byed dang nges pa 'jug/ gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung// ci car 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bya dang bya thabs bya med pa// skyes dang ma skyes skye
'gag med// 'di kun ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skar bkram// yongs su rdzogs pa mkha' khyab bdal// 'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres gcig/ rmongs rim cig car
'jug spyod pa// 'dod pa'i yul la zhen spong dang// spyod sgyur shes rtogs spyod dbang byed// shes pa 'jig rten rtog 'phags pa// spyod pa blo ldan dbang sgyur thabs// gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir
gzigs te// zhen chags log sred rigs rgyud can// blo gros can gyi snod rnams la// bstan bya rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa// 'dod rkyen bkri drung brgyud pa'i tshig/ ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhin// snod

kyi rkyen dang sbyar ba yin// 'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig la// 'dod pas mthong ba tha dad pa'o// 'di ltar mthong sgo tha dad bzhin// rnam par snang 'byung bkod pa la// gang gis kun la zhugs bltas nas//

gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o// ji ltar bung ba khung tshol ba// kun tu 'jug cing byung nas ni// rang gi gser khung gang yin par// nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar// rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol ba// spyod
sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu// lta sgror 'jug cing brtags bsdur nas// don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o// de nyid don gyi rjes gcad phyir// sgo mo kun nas bsdur ba yi// bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te//
goms par bya ba rab tu gces// lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni phyis 'byung ba snang ba'i yongs su dbye ba yin te// kun nas bsdur bar bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras
pas// dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi sgo rang snang bar shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgos pa 'dus pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i
le'u zhes bya ste drug cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag mthar phyin par bya ba ni gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthar phyin par bya'o// bsam du med pa ni sems kyi de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o// sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid du

mthar phyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas na sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas na bsam du med pa'i mkhas
par 'gyur ro// bsam du med pa la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/ de ni dgongs pa kun nas

'dus pa nyid du shes par bya'o// grogs po dag de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'grel pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor
dang// bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor ro// grogs po dag bya ba'i rnal 'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dang/ nang gi rnal

'byor dang/ phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ro// grogs po dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa rdo rjes zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang/ de bzhin du chu rdo rje dang/ me rdo rje dang/ rlung rdo rje dang/ nam

mkha' rdo rje dang/ gzugs rdo rje dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po

dag nang gi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang/ de bzhin du rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa la sogs pa gang zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho

na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ thams cad dang/ dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ nges pa dang/ ma nges pa dang/ dman pa dang/ dam pa

dang/ 'byung ba dang/ mi 'byung ba dang/ byas pa dang/ ma byas pa dang/ bcas pa dang/ ma bcas pa dang/ spyi mthun dang/ khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du

gyur pa'o// grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o// bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ rten pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ mig dang/ khyad par dang/ mi 'gyur ba dang/ rtsal

gyis gnon pa dang/ kun nas rig pa'o// grogs po dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba dang/ mi gnas pa dang

bskyod pa dang/ bsgyur ba dang/ rtsal ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ sgo dang/ shes pa dang/ gnas dang/ rig pa dang/ lam dang/ 'jug pa dang/ ye shes dang/ khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs

pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa yin pa'o// gzhan yang mthong ba dang/ ma yengs pa dang/ don dang/ tshig dang/ sngags dang/ yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na

nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o// grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o// kye grogs po dag bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang/ bslab pa dang/

sbyor ba dang/ rtog pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ ma nor ba dang/ nges pa dang/ dgongs pa dang/ ye shes dang/ tshogs dang/ bsgrub pa dang/ dngos grub dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ chen po dang/ ye shes dang/ byung
tshul dang/ che ba dang/ rol pa dang/ rngom pa dang/ brjid pa dang/ mthu dang/ cho 'phrul dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar phyin cing phul du gyur par

bya'o// de yang ji ltar zhe na/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ ji ltar mthon ri rtse dag la// sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na// mthon sar snang mthong kun gsal bas// thams cad kun snang lam la mkhas// de

bzhin shes rab mthon ri la// brtson pa dam pas kun bltas na// kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin/ mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do// don la mkhas par bya ba ste// phul du byung ba'i bslab pa ste// dgongs pa
dam pa de nyid la// mkhas par bya bar rab tu gces// grogs po dag de dag ni mthar phyin par bya ba rab tu shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas// dman pa'ilus sems dpa' rnams kun gyi phul du gyur par
dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu drug pa'o//// de

nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag thams cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/ bya ba dang/ rang bzhin dang/ bsgyur bas so// grogs po dag de la bya ba ni bsdu ba'i bya

bas so// rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so// bsgyur bas 'dul bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang/ dus dang/ tshad dang/ grags pa dang/ gags dang/ rtags dang thob pa'o// grogs po dag de la rgyu ni yo byad

chen po lnga kho na'o// dus ni mtha' bcu rdzogs pa dang/ nye bar dris pa dang/ rigs can 'du ba dang/ gsal ba thob pa dang/ las su rung ba dang/ mtshan ma 'byung ba dang/ mang po sngags pa dang/ nyams rnyed

pa dang/ bya ba rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag tshad ni 'di lta ste/ ded dpon dang/ snga ltas dang/ smin pa'o// grog po ded dpon gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ goms pa dang/ rig pa dang/ 'du ba dang/ thob pa dang/

rdzogs pa'o// grogs po dag snga ltas ni 'di lta ste/ mthong ba dang/ 'byor ba dang/ nus pa dang thos pa'o// grogs po dag smin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mngon spyod dang/ mi bskyod pa'o// grogs po dag grags pa gang

zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chu bo bzhi'i rgyud du byung ba dang/ gang dag las 'phags pa dang/ gang dang ldan pa dang/ gang la mkhas pa dang/ gang thob pa nyid do// grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thob

pa dang/ mi chags pa dang/ mi gos pa dang/ sreg pa'o// rtags gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ grags pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ btsan pa dang/ 'byung ba'o// grogs pa dag thob pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bskur bas
thob pa dang/ rtsal gyis thob pa'o// grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par rig par bya ste/ gang 'dir snying rje'i yul rnams la// byin brlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung// 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor
pa dag la// glegs bam bcu gnyis sbyin par bya// gang sbyor ba yi rnal 'byor la// nyi zla gnyis ni spyin par bya// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rin chen bdun nyid nges par 'thob// lung chen

thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// g.yung drung brgyad dag thob pa yin// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtsal bcu'i khyad par de nyid 'thob// kun gyi bla ma dam pas ni/ rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob//
dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di// ma thos gzu lums rang bshad pas// rab 'byams bstan pa kun brtsal yang// dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba// mang pos dbang
por dpon bstabs te// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar// de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te// rtogs stong 'bar ba la sogs pas//

khyad par bla ma dam par 'gro// 'di ni bla ma'i khyad par te// rgyal sang nges par 'byung ba yi// rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i thabs// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// kye grogs po dag de dag ni thams
cad 'du bar bya ba yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o// de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa dam pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las
rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun cu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag la dor bar bya ba ni 'di

lta ste/ gang go cha gyon pa'i rjes su mi ldog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i rjais su ji snyed pa 'gro ba/ nam mkha'i rjes su 'byung ba 'gro ba bzhin sems nyid kyi rjes su sems las byung ba 'gro ba yin/
chos nyid kyi rjes su chos thams cad 'gro ba yin// de bzhin du dgongs pa dam pa'i rjes su gang gsung ba dang/ gang mdzad pa thams cad 'gro bas na/ dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du

gang du spyod pa de ltar ro// kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/ mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam// kun nas mi mnyam yongs su mnyam// gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyad pa yang// gang dang don gyi mnyam par

spyad// byin gyis brlabs kyis spyod pa'am/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste/ dper na nam mkha'i rgyal po'am// ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra// de yang de yul che chung gis// khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin//
rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis// dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la// che chung rim pa yod pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang// thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang// bab tshod thad du

'jug pa ste/ dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa// rab dang glang chen bab mi lta// de yang rtsal sgyid drag zhan gyis// la la thad du gcod pa la// la la chu yi gzhol phyogs so// de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa//

'bras bu dran la bab gcod kyang// rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis// ji ltar nus tshad de spyod phyir// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang// sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang// spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin

dang// dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang/ lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur nas// thams cad gcig las med na yang// grangs sam dbye ba grags phrag rnams// snod kyi rtsal dang sbyangs nas ni/ khyad par ci

yang bstan pa yin// de yang rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// dang po las kyi khyad par las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams// rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// sogs pa'i

rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul// spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa// sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang// btsal ba'i yul ni chad ma yin// nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa// rang skal 'tsho ba'i tshod bor nas//
rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho ba'i// longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang// de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral zhing// skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag/ skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o// de phyir dgongs pa
kun 'dus la// gang 'dir rnal 'byor dman don du// gso dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag/ dman pa dag dang mnyam par gsungs// gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di// rtog pa can dang mthun par spyad// gso ba

rtog pa zin pa'i nad// lta spyod nyams pa'i sman gyis gso// shi bslang ba yi rtog pa 'di/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnams// rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas// gti mug bam chen ro blangs te// skye 'gag
med par blang ba'i phyir// ro la yid bzhin nor bu yi// sngags kyis btab ste gnon par bya// ro yi gnyen por bdag gyur nas// ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas// ro yi gzi byin byung ba na// bar chad

med pa'i brtson 'grus bya// ro de 'gul bar gyur pa dang/ gang gi 'gyur rtsis byug par bya// ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas// bzlas pa drang po rgyun mi gcad// gang der langs par gyur pa dang/ cho 'phrul
'jigs tshal ston par byed// brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de tshe ro yi lce bcad bas// ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur// lce
bshad ral gri mtshon cha dang// ro yi 'go bo bcad pa des// ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// mgo thod go char bzung nas ni// lce yi ral gri mtshon thogs nas// lha min g.yul yang ldog par
'gyur// ro langs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni// dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste// skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa yis// phyogs bzhir bltas te dus gcig tu// mda' 'phangs sa la ma babs pas// mtha' blangs
skad cig 'jig rten bskor// skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar// de ma thag tu gnas su slebs// yud ltar shin tu myur ba 'thob// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// ro la 'dod pa thams cad 'byung// ro la ror

bsgrub ro grub na// ro yi dngos po mi snang bar// gang ltar bsgrubs pa de snang phyir// rol la rnam rtog ga la yod/ ro la ro yi rang bzhin dag/ med par shes pas thag chod bzhin// spyod pas de ltar mnyam
spyad na// lta spyod mnyam zhes dam pas bshad// 'di ni shi ba slong ba yi// bdud rtsi dam pa'i spyod pa'i zhes// dgogs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus gsungs// grogs po dag de dag ni shi ba slong ba'i rtogs pa

yongs su spyod par shes par bya'o// grogs po dag de la sbyong ba'i spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtogs pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba dang/ rgyud yongs su sbyang ba'o// de la rtogs pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba ni gang rtogs pa'i

dngos po sbyong ba'o// grogs po dag rgyud yongs su sbyang ba ni bkod pa bya bas sbyang ba dang/ me'i bya bas sbyang ba'o// de la bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba gang zhe na/ brtsams pa las kyi dang po dang// dam pa'i don

la 'jug pa na// thabs mchog lngas ni sbyang bar bya// rdo rje dus tshigs bsnyen pa dang// gang 'dir nye bar bsgrub pa dang/ sgrub po chen pos sbyor ba la// grags dus mtshan mar bcas par bya// rnal 'byor
bcad pa'i bka' sgo 'dir// gsang go mi dbye skrag par 'gyur// ci phyir dang po yin pas na// byis pa blo shed ma bye ba// ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis// theg chen don las go bar 'gyur// gnas 'dir

'jug pa'i byis pa dag/ 'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang// 'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste// ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar// rdo rje thabs chen tshom bu lnga// rdo rje 'dzin tshogs bcu drug ldan//
dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// bri bya yang na bsam pa'am// brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis// mos pa la bskyed dran byas te// rang bzhin yul las phan nas

ni//phyag bya la sogs mchod na ni// rdo rje dman dang rtsir sbyar ba// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te// mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas/
mnyes nas rgyud sbyangs 'dod par bya// snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag/ dpang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// rdo rje tha tshig rnams lnga yis// bslab pa'i

gnyen rnams ci rigs par// rtsal gyis rnam par byin nas kyang// rdo rje gal chen mna' bor ro// de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o// mi nus la

sogs mi snang ba'i// rdo rje'i tshig gis nan chags bya// rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed de// ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul// thams cad rim bzhin bstan par bya//

drod can blo dkyil che rnams la// rnal 'byor nang par gsang sgo dbye/ rtsing po 'gros kyi dmu rgod la// gcan 'phrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung gi tshig can la// ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur/
rtsal med mi nus gang dag la// phan pa 'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin// gnas 'dir gsal dag mi gsal dag/ 'od mi dbab cing ljig mi dbab// rdo rje blo yi yul can la// rtsal chen sbyong zhes gdam par bya/

rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje don gyi ltar chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag/ spyi'am yang na re re'o// gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs// ji ltar
thabs kyi zhogs sbyor ltar// gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo tshogs su bkod nas kyang// gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar
sbas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i gsungs rnams la// mnyam pa'i mtshon pas mnyes par bya// bro gar glu tshig la sogs pas// ri 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub// gzhan yang dus bzhi mnyam rig na// dus zhes bya

ba ga la rigs// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// de nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no// rdo rje lha mo dus kyi tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang/ mi 'byung ma nges cha rnams la// dbang gyur mnyam pa'i rgyal

mo rnams// 'jig dang skye dag smin pa dang/ stongs par gyur pa de dag tu// rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang// sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dam pa'i dkyil// ji ltar rim par rdo rje

yis// glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul ji lta bar// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen po la sogs pa// tshom bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir

ram re rer sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa rnam thar tshogs bsgrun te/ da ltar 'byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang rnam thar bsgrun// de ni mnyam pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor byang chub
sems// rdzogs par bcu drug zla rgyas tshul// snying rje ye shes shar ba na// mkha' la nyi shar tshul bzhin du// dam pa'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yang dag nges pa'i sa pa yin// bcu gsum la

la bgrod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi rgyun tshogs sbyar// skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pas na// brdzes pa'i

zla ba bcu drug gis// nyi gsal 'od kyi phyag rgya la// mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de// bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bskrun// rdzogs pa nyid na mi dmigs pa// de bzhin nyid du sbyangs pas na// mnyam pas stong

par gyur pa la// thams cad chos skur rdzogs byang chub// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de// rmad byung sems bskyed las chen spyad// phra mo drod du gyur pa na// dam pa spyad na nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyun gyi

bar chad na// snyan pa dag gis bzlog par dka'// bar chad byung na bskang gso bya// mkha' la zla gsal grwa rgyas bzhin// sa la rnal 'byor grwa rgyas spyad// gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang/ bsngo ba chen po'i

las rnams bya// des ni nyi zla zhon 'gro ba'i// rig 'dzin sa la gnas phan chad// bde chen bcu gsum sa la 'grub// gzhan yang rgyun du bya ba ni// chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyal ba sku gsung thugs

su snang// sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag/ yi ge phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge phyag rgya'i ye shes rnams// rgyun gyi rgyun du bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob// rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam

dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la// mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no// 'di ni don dam nye ba'i lam// dam pa bskrun par 'gyur phyir ro// 'dir ni rgyun gyi rgyun tshogs des// dam pa'i dam

par de nyid 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings// thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di// rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'drel bas ni// thams cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes bya// rdo rje
'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// 'dod pa'i khams ltar mnyam par

gsungs// gzhan yang gang du gang 'brel ba'i// gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// phan tshul dra bas 'brel ba la// stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// sprul pa bya

ba ci yang snang// gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel// rnal 'byor chen po'i yul de nyid// rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya'o// gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni// blo gros chen po
thabs ldan pas// mi skrag dga' ba'i ngo mtshar skye// gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga gnyis zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul

sbyor// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang// rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon nyid sgra brnyan dril bu dang// rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'phyo zhing bdud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo

ba'i yul gyis ni// seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// sems pa dman pa'i lus khri la// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te/ kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar ba// bcu gsum cha
lugs bsgegs pa rnams// rim gyis sam ni cig car bskyed// gang 'dir 'dod khams chags zhen pa'i// dbang po rim pa sbyar bar bya// de min yab yum yang mi dmigs// gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor

rnams kyang// gnas gyur ba yi rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'byung sbyor// sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang

phyi yi yo byad ni// bzhi gnyis dag gis gnyer sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no// rdo rje sgo dang bcas par ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor longs spyod cher sbyar bas// mnyes

nas sbyar phyir rim bzhin dbul// gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams bsgrub par bya// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba mthun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun

sum tshogs// mdza' 'phrod rkyen dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril// ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyad// skad cig yun tsam thang cig gam/ yud tsam nyin gcig zla re'am// lo yi nyi ma
bkra shis kyi// dus la bab pa'i dus chen dag/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i yod byad rnams// dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis// gtsang ma kha zas la sogs dang/ rnam rtog nad

'joms bdud rtsi rnams// rgyal ba'i tshogs dang 'byung po la/ ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang// chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog tshul sbyar//

rnal 'byor snying dang mi lta bur// gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer gzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod ltar bde bar sbyar// lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang// don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir/
las 'di spyad par shin tu gces// 'di dag blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya ba'i rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang// cis 'dul de ltar rtsal dang sbyar// des na las 'di
khyad par yang// tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te// bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o// de skad sems dpa' rdo rje des// 'dus pa phal mo che la
bshad// 'dus pa kun gyi don mthong ba// rdo rje 'dzin pa de la gsol// sems dpa' che po bdag cag gis// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// thabs nyid shes rab nyi bkod dang// kun nas mnyam dang
bcu drug cha// yi ge tshogs dang 'byung ba'i dbyings// gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du// snang bar nges par mthong lags so// de skad gsol bas des gsungs
pa//gang 'dir 'dus pa'i tshogs med kun// ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin/ ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na// dgongs pa dam pa lhun grub pa// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
dam pa nyid// de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas// sems can gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal// rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du// thams cad ye nas zhugs bkod rdzogs// de las khyad par skal ldan
ni//spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brnyan te// ras 'jal khod snyoms bzang la sogs/ kha dog lnga'am nyi shu lngas// ma mthong rmongs la bsten phyir mtshon// ma nyams mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur// bsten zhing

des 'jam khang bu la/ kha dog 'bar ba gzugs mtshon te// phyag rgya ma nyams mdzes ldan na// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ston par nus// gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa// gang blugs rgyal ba'i sku byas te/

phyag rgya ma nyams dang ldan na// des yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/ shes rdo dung la sogs pa la// 'bul las rgyal ba'i sku byas na// de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur//

blag sha byang chub shing sogs la// mkhas pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis// phyag rgya ma nyams kun rdzogs na// 'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas// kha dog mdzes dang

ldan byas la// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten yin te// mtshan mas mtshan ma grol rig pa// gang dag sa las rgyal ba'i dbyibs// kun du lham par byas pa la// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes bkod na// rnam grol rig pa'i
rten du 'gyur// gang gi gzugs brnyan gang yin dang// de yi rang bzhin gcig pas na// 'di la khyad par cung zad med// 'di yis rnam grol rig par 'gyur// bder gshegs pho brang gang yang rung// dkyil

'khor tshul du gang byed pa// yid 'ong mtshan ldan dben phyogs su// kun nas lham par mdzes byas la// srad bu brgyad dang ldan byas te// bsdu ba'i bya bas mdzes byas pa// de nas srad bu gcig gis bskor//
dkyil 'khor tshul du gyur pa dang// nang du lham bu srad bu brgyad// le'u tshe ldan pa dgur 'gyur te// mtha' zad sum char byas pa la// kun gyi nang du srad bu gsum// phra mo dag gis mdzes par

brgyan// dgu yi char ni bgos pa la// sgo dang sgo khyud sum cha bya// ka ba brgyad kyi mdzes byas la// rin chen ka ba'i nang logs su// sangs rgyas pho brang dbu rtse bya// bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo// rim pa

gsum gyis mdzes pa la// rta babs them skas kyis kyang brgyan// dbus kyi pho brang le'u tshe'am// 'khor lo dpa' be'u pad+ma dang/ rin chen zur brgyad la sogs pa// ji ltar rigs pa de bzhin bri// rgyan ni rin

chen sna tshogs dang// pany+tsa ra ka twa ra na// phreng ba dang ni dra bas brgyan// za ra tshags dang chun 'phyang dang// dril bu g.yer ka the'u chung 'phyang// rol mau sgra sgrogs lha yi bu// mang pos phyi nang nam mkha' las//

mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul ba bri// theg chen gdung bzhis rab brgyan te// rin chen kha bad mchod rten dang// rgyal mtshan rin chen 'od 'bar bas// gzhal yas mdzes par brgyan pa yi// chos kyi pho brang ci

'dra bar// de 'dra de nyid mtshon par bri// gzhal yas khang du gang rgyud pa// kun gyi mdzes dang legs par brgyan// mchod pa bla na yod med kun// ji ltar 'byor ltar nan tan dbul// rgyal srid longs spyod

btsas pa dang// glu bro gar dang rol mor bcas// dug 'joms sman dang bdud rtsi rnams// rgyal ba rgya mtsho snyed la dbul// mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod sbyar bas// rgyud byang thams cad mnyam par gyur// de skad

smras pas 'dus pa kun// thams cad rgyud byang rnam grol rig/ grogs po dag de dag ni bkod pa'i bya bas yongs su sbyang bar shes par bya'o// grogs po dag 'di la me'i bya bas yogs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad me'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du snang ba mthong ste/

shin tu ngam nas ngo mtshar du bstod pa/ e ma'o sems dpa' sems dpa' che// che ba'i che ba byin brlabs che// ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che// cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che// thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang
ste//chos kun me dpung 'bar bar snang// de nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong// 'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pa ni// mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs// bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs pas// dpa' bo
khyod kyis mdzad pa lags// 'bar ba chen po a la la// gzi brjid zer 'phro a la la// mtha' yas kun sdud a la la// thams cad sreg byed a la la// za byed chen po a la la// mtha' dang bud med a la
la//thugs rje bde mchog a la la// dbang phyug 'jigs byed a la la// gsang mchog rmad 'byung byin brlabs kyis// me yi rang bzhin rin po dag/ bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol//
de skad 'dus pas gsol ba las// de nyid dgyes pas 'di skad du// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag/ nges par bshad kyis gus par nyon// khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis/

rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas// rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsregs sbyangs// don grub las kyi mchog tu sbyangs// ji bzhin pa yi hom khung du// ji snyed pa yi yam shing la// de bzhin nyid kyi me byung bas//

thams cad thams cad bsregs sbyangs thim// skye med rnam dag hom khung du// skye ba rnam bzhi'i yam shing la// ma skyes spros bral med byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim// bsam du med

pa'i hom khung du// bsam gyis mi khyab yam shing la// 'od dpag med pa'i me byung bas// mtha' yas rdul snyed bsregs sbyangs thim// chos nyid rnam dag hom khung du// chos can sna tshogs yam shing la// stong
nyid ye shes me 'bar bas// dngos po'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim// sems nyid rnam dag hom khung du// sems can skye 'gro yam shing la// rang 'byung ye shes me 'bar bas// 'khor ba'i bag chags

bsregs sbyangs thim// kun gzhi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes lnga yi me byung bas// gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs sbyangs thim// snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du// 'byung ba bzhi

yi yam shing la// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i me byung bas// snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim// rnam bzhin las kyi hom khung du// bzhi'am bzhi yi yam shing la// rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i me byung bas// mchod

sbyin dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim// 'di yang so so'i khyad par gyis// phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas// gang ltar rigs pa de ltar sbyar// shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar// mthing ga nag po thal

mthog sbyar/ zlum po pad+ma le'u tshe bzhi// 'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas// zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang// gru gsum b+ha ga'i mkha' mngon spyod// gsum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes// las

kyi yam shing rdzas gyis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje las rgyud ldan// bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar// dag pa'i mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar// mchod pa nges pas 'byor tshogs sbyar/

rdo rje las kyi byin brlabs sbyar// gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas// bsher btab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang// rgyas dang dbang bshad rgyud bshad pas// lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang// de bzhin glu yi rgyud
'byor bya// rigs kyi rigs rgyud lngar rnams ni// so so rigs su bsher btab ste// klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du// dam rdzas bdud rts-i 'bar ba yis// sbyangs dang thob phyir bsreg byar

'os// dpag med rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// che ba sngags pa'i yon tan dag/ rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang// mnyes par bya ba'i thabs chen brtsam// mnyes pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang// gang yang ma byang
don chen rnams// grub dang ma grub de rnams dag/ mi la mkhas pas brtag par bya// me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis// 'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnams drug/ de dag yongs su shes par bya// gal te

mtshan la mi sdug na/ yid du mi 'ong rtags yin pas// sreg sbyangs chen pos rgyas par bya// de nas yid 'ong 'dod 'byung ba/ dai la 'dod pa'i mtshan ma rnams// rnam gsum gang ltar 'grub pa blang// 'dus pa

chen po gzhan yang gang// ro yi rdzas rnams sreg sbyang na// ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang// shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// ro la byug cing bkru bar bya// bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis// ras la byugs pas

ro dkris pas/ ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par// sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas// phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa gang// de yi mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams// gang du

bkod pa de nyid du// snying po grangs kyang de ltar bya// snying po dag la so so yi// ma nor rtsa ba'i yig 'bru dag/ ras sam shing la bris te dgod// ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang// ro yi phyi rgyal thams cad du/
nyon mongs 'khor ba kun bkod de// ras sam shing shun gang dag la// 'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod// nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas// skye bzhi las lnga rgyud drug rnams// ming dang gzugs su
byas na ni// gnas gnas dag du dgod par bya// sa bon 'du byed dngos po lnga// gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa pa rnams// brda yi tshul du bkod nas ni// ro rnams khyab par dgod par bya// de nas ro yi

phung po de// rten nas glegs ma stegs bu yi// steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya// thab kyi cho ga bya ba yang// maN Dal khor yug rin tsam la// brko dang kha khyer lugs bzhin bya// phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho
brang dag/ thig gis yul bcad so sor dbye// de yi steng du bsregs shing brtsigs// dbyibs ni rigs bzhir btams pa la// grwa zur ka bas brtan par brten// sum brtseg yang tho bar khang bcas// tha
ma yam shing brdzangs pas btams// bar khang dag gi glegs bam la// ro yi bzhin phyogs ro bzhir bstan// ro yi staing khang ya thog tu// ras la sogs pa bris pa yi/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
gsal bar dgod// ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la// rdo rje gzungs kyi rgyud thag bzhes/ btags nas bla ma'i phyag tu phul// shing gi bya ba rdzogs pa dang/ de yi phyi mtha' stegs bu la// rnam bzhi las

kyi lha rnams dgod/ stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang// rdo rje las kyi sgos btab pa// rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la// 'khor ba sreg par mnga' gsol te// mi g.yo me chen rtse gcig pas// me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/

rdo rje sngags kyi las sbyar la// rnam bzhi las kyi mnga' gsol te// las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya// bla ma rdo rje dam pa zhig/ ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas// las kyis bsags pa bgrang zhing gshegs//

skabs sbyor rdo rje la ma yis// bla med mchod pa rgyun du bya// bro gar glu tshig stabs chen gyis// mchod par rol mo sna tshogs dbul// rdo rje las kyi smon lam gdab// mchod skabs las kyi 'jug du bya// rdo rje

las kyi lta 'dzin pas// dkar byang las kyi lta bzung ste/ legs mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul// ro yi nyes mtha' gang 'dzin pas// mtshan ma nag po bud shing dag/ ye shes me yi klong du sreg/ me sbyor me la
gnas pa'i lha// me yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med// me yi lha mo gos dkar mo// rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te// 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing// thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin// srid gsum sreg par

zhal gyis 'ches// dngos po sreg pa'i phrin las ni// thugs dam dbang gis yang mi 'da'// gang gi sgrib sreg de nyid mkhyen// ro yi rnam shes byang ma byang// me la mkhas pas de bzhin brtag/ mi sdug tshul

'byung sreg sbyang bya// gal te lags na me dbang bskur// thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la sogs bya// dam pa zhig na gdung btags te// bla ma'i rten du dbul bar bya// 'di ni

sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ de skad sems dpa' mchog des smras// grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yongs su shes par bya'o// rdo rje gsang ba chos kyi spun// me yi bya ba las byung ba// gdung zhes grags pa'i

sha ri ram// dpag med ji srid dus dag nas/ grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba dgamya ngan 'das par gyur phyi na// med pa las byung sku gdung ni// sku yi gdung dang ring bsrel zhes// 'gro ba'i bsod nams rten

du grags// rgyal ba rnams ni dngos med pas// sku gdung ring bsrel mi srid na// sems can rnams la phan don du// med las thugs rje'i cho 'phrul bzhag/ de bzhin gang du gang byung ba'i// gang 'dir snang ba

sgron ma dag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung yang// sha ri ram zhes grags par 'gyur// de yi las kyang de bzhin no// de la sogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams// tshul mthun
gcig par gyur pa yi// sku gdung sa bon byin brlabs kyi// yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba// 'dzam gling sa khams khyab par snang// gdung las byung phyir sra mkhregs zlum// tha skad rdo rje rab tu
grags// lgang bu zur gsum til lgang 'dra// gzhon tshe'i mar ram 'o mar snang// nar son smin rtags sra zhing mkhregs// tsa na ka yi 'bru bzhin du// dkar la tsan dmar kha dog gsal// zos pa'i yon tan
bsam mi khyab// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchog tu grags// de bzhin rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams// mi yi lus su sprul pa dang/ gang zag sa pa chos mig ldan// bsod nams dpa' zhing dag pa dag/ sdong bu snying

por sbyangs phyi na// skal ba can la snang ba ni// la la dag la sha ri ram// la la dag la ring bsrel sku// skal ngan dag la snang mi 'gyur// la la snang bar gyur na yang// sbyor ba dag la yun du rtag/ ma dag

nub cing 'bros par 'gyur// yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba'i// 'byung ba'i ltas ni ston par byed// yod par rtag pa ma yin la// med pa rlag par yang mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor las dang 'byor pa rnams// dag dang
ma dag tshul la sbyor// de yang bsod nams dag pa yis// gang lam rgya cher mos pa dang/ rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na// rdo rjes sbrel dang las mthun na/ rgyun rnams yongs su dag la 'bab// de yang
khyad par rim pas ni// rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram// zhing khams kun du khyab par ni// mgar dang bzos ni bzlums pa bzhin// byas pa med las snang ba dag/ dkar 'tsher mdog gsal 'dzag 'dra ba//
tsan dmar mdangs su gsal ba yi// nam mkha' gang bar char bzhin 'bab// rig 'dzin sems dpa' sprul pa'i gdung// dkar gsal 'ga' 'ga' tsam du 'byung// gang zag sa pa'i rtags chen ni// mdog
mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig/ la lar lnga'am bcu 'byung zhing// yon tan de ni de ltar ro// de yang sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra// lcags kyi gtun gyis yang mi chogs// 'di dag phebs pa'i yon tan
yang// gang dang gang du babs pa yi// yul khams de dag thams cad du// nad dang mi nges bgegs rnams zhi// gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs pa// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// rgyal po 'khrugs dang
khams 'khrugs dang/ yul khams 'khrugs pa'ang zhi bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog 'phel smin cing// yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung// yul de dmangs dang rgyal po yi/ sa bon thams cad bu phor 'gyur//
bder bcas mtshan ldan rigs mthon ni// bu pho kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di dag su la 'chang ba rnams// rig 'dzin sa dang skal ba mnyam// 'jig rten 'di yi bsod nams kyang// 'khor
los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam// de yi dgongs pa kun du 'grub// tshe dang skengs dang las 'grub 'gyur// phyin cad bla med byang chub ni// sa la reg pa'i rtags chen yin// gzhan yang yon tan
bsam mi khyab// de dag rang gi rang bzhin du// gnas pa'i yon tan de dag go/ bsgrubs na yon tan bsam mi khyab// sems can rnams pa thams cad la// byang chub snying po nyid yos pas// me yi las kyi bya

ba yis// lnga phung sbyangs na med mi srid// 'di dag bsgrub par bya ba yang// shel gyi za ma tog nang du// bsdus te phyag rgya'i rgyas btab nas// shel gyi ga'u'i nang du bca'// bsgrub pas de la smon lam dang//

sgrib sbyang gso la 'phro 'du bya// 'phro 'du bya ba'i cho ga yang// nam mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram// zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las// char gyi rgyun bzhin de la 'bab// rtse gcig bzlas pa gsung gi rgyun// ma hA

sha ri ram gyi li hU~M/ grangs med bar chad med par bzlas// mchog tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba dang// 'od kyi zer phreng nyi zer bzhin// zang zing brang breng snang bar 'gyur// za ma tog gi phyi rol na// gsal ba de
la 'byung bar 'gyur// 'gul zhig mang por 'phel ba dang// rgyal ba sems dpa' rig 'dzin gyis// gzugs brnyan shel dang de las ni// gsal bar bdag la ston par 'gyur// dang po snod de khegs pa
